alert.note: Alert for Bosque; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:09PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central McLennan and southeastern Bosque Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 809 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Valley Mills and Clifton, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waco, McGregor, Clifton, Valley Mills, Crawford, Lake Waco, China Spring, Norse, Cayote, Willow Grove, Mosheim, Womack and Rock Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
